## vision\_v1.Schema$BatchOperationMetadata interface

Metadata for the batch operations such as the current state.

This is included in the `metadata` field of the `Operation` returned by the `GetOperation` call of the `google::longrunning::Operations` service.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$BatchOperationMetadata 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [endTime](./vision.vision_v1.schema_batchoperationmetadata.endtime.md) | string \| null | The time when the batch request is finished and google.longrunning.Operation.done is set to true. |
|  [state](./vision.vision_v1.schema_batchoperationmetadata.state.md) | string \| null | The current state of the batch operation. |
|  [submitTime](./vision.vision_v1.schema_batchoperationmetadata.submittime.md) | string \| null | The time when the batch request was submitted to the server. |
